page.title: 10Education in Ashton,Preston
page.content: The main Playgroups in the area are St.Christophers ,Larches,and Savick. After playschool most of the children go to Lea County Primary,St.Bernards R.C.Infants,Savick C.P.and Larches C.P. although a minority go to Lea Endowed or St.Andrews C.E.Primary. St.Bernards R.C. Infant School sends its children to the junior school which is on a seperate site. Larches C.P is due to close at the beginning of the school year in 1985 because of a weakening structure in the main support beams of a school which is not 20 years old . Most of the children will go to Lea C.P. After primary education the majority of the children go to Cuthbert Mayne, Edmund Campian or Ashton High School depending upon religion.A minority go to other schools in Preston or into the independent sector.
